CustomField.description: A prospecting call is when the call goes to an account with no open, qualified oppty; account status is not "open opportunity", "existing customer" with an open oppty, the qualification date is blank, OR the call occurred before the first oppty qualification date
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(Related_Contact__r.Account.First_Purchase_Opportunity__r.Qualified_Date__c) || ActivityDate <= DATEVALUE(Related_Contact__r.Account.First_Purchase_Opportunity__r.Qualified_Date__c), TRUE,
IF( Account_Status_Copy__c = "Open Opportunity" || (Account_Status_Copy__c = "Existing Customer" && OR(Open_Oppty_Rev_Copy__c > 0,ISNULL(Open_Oppty_Rev_Copy__c))) || ISBLANK(Account_Status_Copy__c) || ISBLANK(Related_Contact__c) , FALSE, TRUE) )
CustomField.label: Prospecting Call
